name: Batch Qty Val
query:
SELECT
  sle.posting_date as "Date:Date:100",
  sle.batch_no as "Batch No:Link/Batch:100",
  sle.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:100",
  i.item_name as "Item Name:Data:100",
  sle.warehouse as "Warehouse:Link/Warehouse:200",
  SUM(sle.actual_qty) as "Qty:Float:100",
  sle.stock_uom as "UoM:Data:100"
FROM
  `tabStock Ledger Entry` sle
  INNER JOIN
  `tabItem` i ON sle.item_code = i.item_code
WHERE (sle.posting_date between %(start_date)s and %(end_date)s) and sle.batch_no = %(batch_no_flt)s
GROUP BY sle.warehouse, sle.batch_no
ORDER BY sle.posting_date ASC
